std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Magdalena Johanna Smith"
Source: Cape Town, English Church (from 1847 St George's Cathedral) (Anglican), Cape Town, Baptism register, 1826-1849. Repository: Western Cape Archives, 72 Roeland Street, Cape Town. Transcribed by Charles Fison. Scans of this register are available on the Wits University Web site, up to April 1834 (last 5 files), 1834 to 1848
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smith anywhere in the surname with magdalena johanna anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Magdalena Johanna Smith baptism on 25 Oct 1829 (born 18 Sep 1829).

std_narrative.citation:
Magdalena was born on 18 September 1829 and baptised on 25 October 1829. '''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Magdalena Johanna Smith"
Source: Cape Town, English Church (from 1847 St George's Cathedral) (Anglican), Cape Town, Baptism register, 1826-1849. Repository: Western Cape Archives, 72 Roeland Street, Cape Town. Transcribed by Charles Fison. Scans of this register are available on the Wits University Web site, up to April 1834 (last 5 files), 1834 to 1848
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smith anywhere in the surname with magdalena johanna anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Magdalena Johanna Smith baptism on 25 Oct 1829 (born 18 Sep 1829).
